html:
6.14.19  6:17 am   let's talk about pop music

     ah, that's what i call pusic

6.14.19  5:52 am   If you could pick any band members from any band to be members of the Bill Wurtz Band, who would be your picks and why? (You're allowed to pick deceased people also, and whoever you pick will be "in their prime".)

     am i allowed to pick people not currently in another band

6.14.19  4:33 am   have you ever been depressed? 

     i don't think so

6.14.19  4:10 am   i think you've said you don't like the term music theory.

     what the heck is music theory

       why though? that term suggests it is a theory, a way of thinking, not the definitive reality. if anything, that name is anything but absolute imo

6.14.19  4:09 am   Do you plan on quitting youtube or over social media?

     no

6.14.19  3:07 am   What are your favorite questions? 

     hi, bye, etc

6.14.19  2:30 am   Sprechen Sie Deutsch?

     i doubt it

6.14.19  1:55 am   how to organize my life

     clockwise maybe,

6.14.19  12:33 am   Do you secretly feel pressure to get people to like your works and be supportive?

     don't we all

6.13.19  11:14 pm   how long did it take to complete the entirety of the new song? trying to make some calculations

     a few weeks, but i still don't think you have all the information you'd need

6.13.19  11:03 pm   how do i be like you?

     take it a step further, be like how you wish i was

6.13.19  10:52 pm   Are you writing a book?

     i prefer to write out of the book

6.13.19  10:35 pm   when release song bill

     as soon as the video is finished

6.13.19  9:20 pm   and Now for the million-dollar questionnn! Is Google GOOD or EVIL?

     they're doing ok so far

6.13.19  8:14 pm   i have been going through your entire website and trying to consume all the content again, but this time cross referencing each page to the others on dates so i can get a better linear timeline for how things were going for you.  did you ever sort of use the 'jazz' page recordings as sort of a warm-up or 'feet wet' exercise in getting back into recording when it had been so long since you had recorded anything?

     actually it originally started as a reading exercise. but then it turned into just a way to jam, without the pressure of having to worry about everything else

6.13.19  7:37 pm   why is the new video taking so long if you used to upload a video every two weeks? 

     because i am doing it in a new and interesting way

6.13.19  6:23 pm   new video when it be?

     seems like it's been every day for the last month or so

6.13.19  5:20 pm   How do you look at yourself?

     sounds boring. how about be self while looking at world around. you will surely see plenty of reflection of yourself, if seeing yourself is what you want

6.13.19  4:37 pm   i got yelled at at work yesterday and i'm still kind of upset about it. do you have any tips

     the next person you are going to yell at, don't yell at them, in honor of the person who yelled at you and perhaps shouldn't have

6.13.19  3:35 pm   is 3:20 the answer

     occasionally

6.13.19  2:30 pm   optimism or pessimism or realism

     inspiration

6.13.19  1:23 pm   have you ever considered letting your audience pick your next song/project

     they could try

6.13.19  1:21 pm   Why bother trying to live this stupid life?

     to uncover the hidden intelligence baked within

6.13.19  1:21 pm   is time a social construct

     not even close

6.13.19  12:16 pm   did you write music when you were young that you would cringe at if you listened now

     no but someone else might

6.13.19  11:09 am   Would you consider writing a musical? They're very hopeful and I think your musical style is full of hope.

     sounds like i am already doing it, in that case

6.13.19  10:24 am   Favourite scientist>

     you

6.13.19  9:54 am   What is this site?

     something dot com, i think it's written at the top

6.13.19  8:58 am   are you a boy or are you a Super Boy (beyond the boy. more than boy) or are you just something else thx

     i'm a customer service representative

6.13.19  7:13 am   Is answering these questions fun?

     it's fun when i can get the right answer

6.13.19  6:02 am   Have you ever written a song for a different tuning than A440?

     i don't recall

6.13.19  5:25 am   how do you decide how many exclamation marks to use in your responses to people asking about your (apparently quite good) mental state?

     a balanced, reasonable number. a modest and fair number in decent good judgement

6.13.19  4:56 am   What's the ideal number of eggs to eat for breakfast?

     not sure

      Is breakfast the fundamental meal for egg-eating, or is it a social construct the chickens have made for us to keep them employed?

     ?? are you kidding, they're in slavery right now

6.13.19  3:54 am   This might be a stupid question, but... How is mitosis

     pretty good, i think

6.13.19  2:49 am   are you a wizard?

     i have that skillset

6.13.19  1:48 am   Favorite music genre? 

     post office

6.13.19  12:40 am   I have a musical problem. I am writing a song. I've planned out all my lyrics, I have a good melody, but I don't know what THEME my song should have. Different instruments make a song have different feelings. Different tempos rhythms and chords can all affect how people feel when they listen to the song. If I choose the wrong theme, then people might not like my song as much. Have you ever had this problem?

      forget theme, make it a scheme

6.12.19  11:21 pm   How can i be more human?

     how do you want to be

6.12.19  11:14 pm   Do your videos/songs have hidden meanings?

     that depends on whether you've found it

6.12.19  10:36 pm   What's your favorite animal

     the leopard. specifically my business partner who is a leopard

6.12.19  10:32 pm   my super power is that i can sting bees!  could you tell me yours?

     i can make merchandise for you stinging bees. all you gotta do is sting the bees, i can make the merchandise

6.12.19  9:53 pm   What do you think your future self 5 years from now will think about you in this very moment?

     i hope this question has a good answer or else i'm skipping to the next one

6.12.19  9:52 pm   are dragons real

     they are right on the line between real and fake

6.12.19  9:44 pm   i have effectively been excommunicated from my group of friends. what do you think i should do?

     find someone / something who(m) you may have excommunicated in the past, and make amends with them

6.12.19  9:38 pm   what would you say was the genre of your music

     oh i'm not falling for that one again

6.12.19  9:23 pm   did you quit youtube

     i don't think so

6.12.19  8:53 pm   whatever happened to predictability?

     someone predicted it. was bound to happen

6.12.19  8:29 pm   6.12.19  6:43 am What the hell is a superspecies?

     i'm not sure

6.12.19  8:18 pm   would you ever try dancing?

     everything is dancing

      what style?

     earth, for now

      would you try tap?

     [yoda voice] do or do not...etc

6.12.19  8:15 pm   Who is this randy that you mention at the top of the screen

     could be you. if it is you, then click that button
